Html:
Hi.

I just found your project and was really impressed with it. Congrats!

I have one question, because the documentation is somewhat lacking (missing): If I use the QuickGraph Silverlight dll in a SL project, is there any (easy) way to see the graph in the SL page and interact with it visually? On your old CodeProject article you mentioned that for winforms you could dispaly the graphs using the tool "Graphviz". However, it has no Silverlight implementation, or even an alternative, as far as I see.

Thanks.
QuickGraph does not provide any viewer anymore - it's a whole project on its own. MSAGL may support this scenario http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/projects/msagl/
